description.ko: 빛이 유리에서 굴절되어 스펙트럼의 숨겨진 색상을 드러내는 가장 역동적인 순간을 포착한 작품.
description.en: A capture of light at its most dynamic moment, refracting through glass to reveal the hidden colors of the spectrum.

prompt: An intricate glass polyhedral fractal hit by a concentrated beam of white light, exploding into a web of #FF0080, #00FF80, and #8000FF spectral shards. Intense light dispersion, rainbow caustics, and #FFFF00 chromatic aberration at every crystal facet. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp macro focus on the points where light splits into pure energy within a dark void. Global illumination and cinematic lighting capture the prismatic energy and the rainbow-saturated atmosphere contained within the glass.
